actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: To amend the Families First Coronavirus Response Act to include the fresh fruit and vegetable program under the Richard B. Russell National School Lunch Act as a qualified program for purposes of certain national school lunch program requirement waivers addressing COVID-19, and for other purposes.
short_title: Fresh Produce for Kids in Need Act
subjects: Emergency medical services and trauma care

summary.text:
Fresh Produce for Kids in Need Act

This bill modifies food and nutrition programs of the Department of Agriculture to include the fresh fruit and vegetable program as a qualified program for purposes of allowing certain waivers of program requirements for the school meal programs due to COVID-19 (i.e., coronavirus disease 2019).

titles.title: Fresh Produce for Kids in Need Act
